text: Modibo Keita (31 July 1942 – 2 January 2021) was a Malian politician. He was the Prime Minister of Mali two times: from 18 March 2002 to 8 June 2002Government of Mali: Office of the Prime Minister : Previous Prime Ministers. and from January 2015 to April 2017. Keita was born in Koulikoro, French Sudan. He was a member of the Alliance for Democracy. Keita died on 2 January 2021 at the age of 78.Ex-Malian PM Modibo Keïta dies at 78 ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Prime ministers of Mali
title: Modibo Keita (born 1942)
